ARWR From YMB So much potential for ARWR GLTAdave14 minutes agoLots about to happen starting tonight with Bruce Givens presentation from Singapore RNAI Pulling Us Toward Finite Therapy Hopefully there will be a link provided to access the presentation Will be 1130PM Pacific but Ill happily listen in if availableAAT dosing for Sequoia and the open label studies will begin soon possibly next week I forget the venue but when asked if dosing would start by the end of May the response was that was a little aggressive but definitely early in June Looking forward to the first OL readout in six monthsThe week after that is the Alpha1 National Conference where Dr Hamilton will provide the Progress in Clinical Development for AROAAT Timing would be nice if dosing of both AAT studies were underway by that pointGood times aheadShow More
